backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining products, inventory, sales, user profiles, cash transactions, and access-controlled CRUD operations using mixins for storage and authorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented frontend changes, associated files, components, and test IDs for two product-related features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend components, pages, hooks, and utilities describing their functionality and UI behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme configuration defining OKLCH color tokens and dark mode overrides for the frontend.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app container managing view routing, query client setup, navbar rendering, and footer attribution.
frontend/src/components/AdjustStockModal: Modal component for adding or reducing inventory stock with validation, backend mutation, and normalized error handling.
frontend/src/components/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard showing daily revenue, payment method totals, inventory data, low-stock detection, and authentication-aware error states.
frontend/src/components/EditInventoryIte: Modal for editing an existing inventory item with validation and update mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/EditSaleModal.ts: Modal for editing a sale record, allowing item quantity/price changes and updating the transaction.
frontend/src/components/InventoryFormMod: Form modal for creating new inventory items with validation, stock calculations, and add mutation.
frontend/src/components/InventoryPage.ts: Main inventory page that lists items, handles add/edit/adjust-stock modals, and manages loading/error states.
frontend/src/components/InventoryReportP: Displays stock adjustment history with error handling and formatted report data.
frontend/src/components/LowStockWarningD: Dialog showing a list of inventory items that are at or below minimum stock levels.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Provides a top navigation bar with logo and menu items, including a dropdown for report-related views.
frontend/src/components/ProductFormModal: Modal form for adding new products, supporting image upload, validation, and submission via addProduct hook.
frontend/src/components/ProductsPage.tsx: Displays the product catalog with loading/error states and provides controls to add products or navigate back.
frontend/src/components/QuantityPromptMo: Prompts the user to input quantity for a selected product and shows price details before confirmation.
Shows a standardized error message with retry functionality using normalized error metadata.
Displays sales reports with date filtering, editing, deleting, exporting, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/SignInRequiredSt: Shows a sign-in prompt using Internet Identity when a feature requires authentication.
frontend/src/components/StockDeductionRu: Empty component file with no implemented content.
Implements a transaction workflow with cart management, payment selection, and sale recording using backend hooks and modals.
frontend/src/constants/productOptions.ts: Defines constant lists of product categories, sizes, and names with associated TypeScript types.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallerRole.ts: Fetches the caller’s backend role with safe fallbacks and warns against using it for UI gating.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardSummary.t: Retrieves dashboard summary data from the backend via an authenticated actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login state, identity loading, and authentication context management.
frontend/src/hooks/useInvalidateActorQue: Provides a helper to invalidate all actor‑related queries for refresh or retry scenarios.
frontend/src/hooks/useInventory.ts: Fetches inventory items and provides mutations to add, update, and adjust inventory stock.
frontend/src/hooks/useInventoryReport.ts: Fetches filtered inventory history reports using the anonymous public actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Loads product data and provides a mutation to add new products.
frontend/src/hooks/usePublicActor.ts: Creates and manages an anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecordSale.ts: Provides a mutation to record sales and invalidates dashboard and inventory queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useSalesMutations.ts: Provides mutations to update or delete sales and refresh relevant reports and summaries.
frontend/src/hooks/useSalesReport.ts: Queries sales records within a timestamp range using an authenticated actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useStockDeductionRule: File exists but contains no implementation.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and defines extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/errorMessage.ts: Provides a function to normalize backend errors into user-friendly messages with auth detection.
frontend/src/utils/exportToXls.ts: Generates an Excel-compatible HTML table from sales data and triggers a .xls file download.
frontend/src/utils/inventoryName.ts: Supplies helpers for normalizing inventory names and checking for duplicates with optional ID exclusion.
frontend/src/utils/salesFormat.ts: Formats currency, timestamps, and payment method labels for sales display.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL or session parameters, including hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, animations, and themes using CSS variables and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project state, feature requests, and known issues for the Product Catalog app.
